explanation:
code_hardening: Added a null check to lazily initialize and cache the fontStylePanel, ensured consistent borders and sizing, and avoided rebuilding Swing components on subsequent calls.
resolve_compilation_errors: Used existing fields (fontStylePanel, TOP_PANE_PREFERRED_HEIGHT) and existing accessors (getFontStyleList, getFontStyleTextField) to ensure compatibility with the current codebase; no new types or signatures were introduced.
exception_handling: none
logic_customization: Moved construction of the font style panel into getFontStylePanel() with lazy creation, switched to BorderLayout, applied an empty border, set a fixed preferred height, added a top-aligned label with mnemonic 'Y' bound via setLabelFor, and wrapped the style list in a JScrollPane with an always-visible, non-focusable vertical scrollbar.
refactoring: Structured the panel with a clear nested layout (label + content panel) and replaced inline layout assumptions with consistent BorderLayout usage and named constants already present in the class.
misc: Updated component alignment for consistent UX and added brief inline comments clarifying lazy initialization and panel structure; no new custom API calls were introduced.
